es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface IGaugeArrowController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GaugeArrowController

    public interface IGaugeArrowController
    Interface for controller of GaugeArrow. Details of GaugeArrow and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
